    • setupController

      public void setupController()
      Method to be overridden if there is the need to do some operations after the FXML is loaded but before the scene is shown to the user. This gets called once, after FXML load

    • onSceneShow

      public void onSceneShow()
      Method to be overridden if there is the need to do some operations everytime the scene is loaded, both from FXML or, if the scene has already been loaded once, from the client cache
